str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
Quickly, presently, perhaps. As if neuter plural of tachus; shortly, i.e. possibly.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From chora; to place room between, i.e. Part; reflexively, to go away.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To have in full, be far, it is enough. From apo and echo; to have out, i.e. Receive in full; to keep away, i.e. Be distant.
